hadiths.text: It was narrated that Wathilah bin Asqa’ Al-Laithi said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) took hold of the top of the Tharid and said: ‘Eat in the Name of Allah from its sides and leave the top, for the blessing comes from its top.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الأَكْلِ، مِنْ ذُرْوَةِ الثَّرِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of eating from the top of the tharid
